title: >>> The ERA of DEVOLUTION ?
body_text:
What a weekend it is going to be: two events, one game.
Back-to-back nights of heart-racing, adrenaline pumping, and intense action you won't find anywhere else. XONE and XTWO are significant events to say the least. If one looks back at the past, you will notice that DAY 1 and DAY 2 were also back-to-back events ...
... And look where we are now ...
XONE and XTWO will continue with the tradition known as dodgeball. It is the end of the beginning, but the beginning of a new era ... ?
One can only wonder what will happen to the game's best competition, most notably the first class of the Hall of Fame ...
Will each of their legacies prove to be nothing more than a myth?
Or will the heart, determination, and athleticism keep them in the dodgeball heavens?
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
With those important questions being raised, it is only believed that XONE and XTWO could very well be the beginning of what is being referred to as the "Era of Devolution".
Is it time for the veterans who have deservingly made a name for themselves to step down?
Will new comers rise to the occasion and take those feared spots currently held by the Hall of Famers?
There are plenty of top name players and it is now their chance to make a name for themselves. The Hall of Fame will continue to induct only the best players. Best be gunning for the big name players on the court if you are looking to join those very names in the elite group.
Questions will continue to come about throughout the next few weeks. The weekend's events will hopefully give us clues as to what we can expect through this next season of dodgeball.

What a weekend it is going to be: two events, one game.


Back-to-back nights of heart-racing, adrenaline pumping, and intense action you won't find anywhere else. XONE and XTWO are significant events to say the least. If one looks back at the past, you will notice that DAY 1 and DAY 2 were also back-to-back events ...

... And look where we are now ...

XONE and XTWO will continue with the tradition known as dodgeball. It is the end of the beginning, but the beginning of a new era ... ?

One can only wonder what will happen to the game's best competition, most notably the first class of the Hall of Fame ...

Will each of their legacies prove to be nothing more than a myth?
Or will the heart, determination, and athleticism keep them in the dodgeball heavens?

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~

With those important questions being raised, it is only believed that XONE and XTWO could very well be the beginning of what is being referred to as the "Era of Devolution".

Is it time for the veterans who have deservingly made a name for themselves to step down?
Will new comers rise to the occasion and take those feared spots currently held by the Hall of Famers?

There are plenty of top name players and it is now their chance to make a name for themselves. The Hall of Fame will continue to induct only the best players. Best be gunning for the big name players on the court if you are looking to join those very names in the elite group.

Questions will continue to come about throughout the next few weeks. The weekend's events will hopefully give us clues as to what we can expect through this next season of dodgeball.
